title: Organizational Learning and Gender Expression: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Through Phenomenological Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Exploration of gender representation and organizational learning interactions within corporate settings. Participants share real-world cases and learn to apply solutions to practical problems

learning_goals: Explain the impact of gender expressions within organizations on knowledge sharing and learning processes
Identify organizational learning barriers by observing and analyzing peer experiences through a phenomenological approach
Propose gender-equity-informed organizational learning improvement plans through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
